Words can't really describe what this game meant to me in muh youths. It was the first time I got involved heavily in any modding community and where I really started getting into DIY. The community back in the day was like no other. I 'member many a comfy Christmas eve playing this. I was always sucking at surfing. Always a lot of fun banter. A shame that CS:GO fragmented the community even further but it was going to come eventually. Shit changes.

Уже трудно вспомнить, когда человечество начало играть в Counter-Strike. Минуло страшное количество лет, но до сих пор миллионы игроков зависают на серверах, гоняя за «контров» и «терроров». Время идет, а технологии шагнули далеко вперед. Чтобы хоть как-то приблизить старенькую игру к современным стандартам, Valve выпустили все тот же Counter-Strike, но на новом графическом движке. Персонажи прибавили в полигонах, разнообразных спецэффектов стало больше. Кроме того, на картах прибавилось деталей, а некоторые вообще были сильно переделаны.

If you like objective based first person shooters that emphasize skill and strategy over grinded level barriers, this is the game for you. With one life per round, you are tasked with carrying out missions of terrorism, or preventing said missions from being completed. With tons of mods like zombie defense and gungame, CSS is a great buy for FPS fans that don't want to spend a lot of money. Expect a steep learning curve that will turn away all but the most diehard players. The flipside to this is the rewarding feeling you get when you're on a hot streak.

Counter-Strike: Source=Counter-Strike: Source, or CS:S, is a highly inviting multiplayer FPS with a keen focus on strategic and competitive gameplay, utilizing strong team-based objectives and cooperation to fuse memorable and favourable multiplayer action.  CS:S thrives on teamwork, and the game's main modes of gameplay strongly reflect this, forging yet another Valve game to perfect team-based play.  CS:S, an overall great FPS experience and team-based game, dosen't posess much, if any, downfalls, other than that of which the players may create themselves, but in the end that minor flaw does not mar the true aspect of this game.  I recommend CS:S for fans of teamwork, skill montages and the FPS genre.
+Great FPS innovations, strong teamwork system

One of the best games to LAN party with. No sprinting, no scoping and no regenerating health. Its all about skill and how you work with team mates to outwit the opponent.

Sie können wählen: Wollen Sie Terrorist sein oder zur Elitetruppe gehören?
Dann rennen Sie los. Immer mit dem Maschinengewehr im Anschlag: durch Straßen, über Plätze oder durch leere Häuser. Und dann müssen Sie ballern, sonst sind Sie selbst dran. Blut spritzt, bleibt an den Wänden kleben. Sie steigen über die zerfetzte Leiche und warten auf den nächsten Feind.
Love it, absolutely worth the $20. Even better when bought via the gmod bundle.
